title: 112年11月20日（週一）辦理藝術中心（湖畔餐廳）建築物室外周邊病媒防治消毒。On Monday, November 20, 2023, we will conduct vector prevention and disinfection of the outdoor areas of the Arts Center (Lakeside Restaurant) building.
author: 許智翔
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 總務處環境保護組 - 許智翔 - cocco3746@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8906399
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 112年11月20日（週一）辦理藝術中心（湖畔餐廳）建築物室外周邊病媒防治消毒。On Monday, November 20, 2023, we will conduct vector prevention and disinfection of the outdoor areas of the Arts Center (Lakeside Restaurant) building.
日期： Fri, 17 Nov 2023 17:11:43 +0800

一、為防止病媒蚊孳生，預定於11月20日上午10時施作藝術中心（湖畔餐廳）建築物室外周邊之消毒工作。
二、消毒期間請勿靠近並請配合關閉一、二樓對外門窗，造成不便，敬請見諒。
三、如遇雨天順延並另行公告施作時間。

總務處環境保護組敬啟

1. In order to prevent the breeding of vector mosquitoes, disinfection work is scheduled to be carried out around the outdoor area of the Art Center (Lakeside Restaurant) building at 10 a.m. on November 20.
2. Please do not get close during the disinfection period, and cooperate with closing the outer doors and windows on the first and second floors. We apologize for the inconvenience.
3. In case of rain, the operation will be postponed and the construction time will be notified separately.

Sincerely, Environmental Protection Group, General Affairs Office
